Description.Text: Skylark Guest House is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in London. The property features a wide range of facilities to make your stay a pleasant experience. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at the Skylark Guest House. Guestrooms are designed to provide an optimal level of comfort with welcoming decor and some offering convenient amenities like internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, heating, wake-up service. Enjoy the hotel's recreational facilities, including garden, before retiring to your room for a well-deserved rest. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Skylark Guest House.
